title: playsherbet
author: playsherbet
content: ..ROUND#8, Date 25/11/23 - 01/12/2023..GUESSING MECHANICSEnter your guess in USD before 01st December 2023 @23:59 UTCRULES AND TERMS- To participate, you need to be a Sherbet player. If you don't have an account with us yet, please register using the provided link.- Each participant can make only one prediction during the specified round.- You must have at least 50 posts on Bitcointalk before October 31st.- Once submitted, you cannot edit your post.- Three winners will be determined based on the Bitcoin price at Coinmarketcap on December 08, 2023, at 10:00 UTC.- The closest predictions will receive $150, $50, and $50, respectively, in BTC or an equivalent currency set on your account.- Rewards will be sent to your Sherbet account and withdraw-able anytime.- Sherbet management reserves the right to edit, update, or cancel this game at any time.POST FORMATCode:Sherbet username:Prediction: $xx,xxx.xx

comments.author: playsherbet
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on November 24, 2023, 06:15:26 PMSherbet username: AdbitcoPrediction: $36,675.26Hi, AdbitcoSorry, we couldn't accept your prediction because it was posted before November 25th. You can rewrite your predictions to meet the rulesRegards,Jt

You can rewrite your predictions to meet the rulesRegards,JtCan repeat back my prediction today?Since it was posted yesterday and will it be acceptable?Of course you can repost, with the same prediction or replace it, because your previous post is not countedRegards,Jt
